title: [Minecraft.net | INSIDER] 知识与奇迹相辅相成的王国
author: Sinbad_Official
txt_content:
本帖最后由 321yu_wango 于 2020-3-29 19:10 编辑 


INSIDER
A Kingdom of Lore and Wonder
知识与奇迹相辅相成的王国
The Realm of Lothiredon makes magic feel real
The Realm of Lothiredon 让魔法不再是幻想

Jess Robinson 杰斯·鲁宾逊
A story-book castle and surrounding town is a delight for the eyes. Submitted by Guss, the Realm of Lothiredon is a collaborative work from a 25-person team that loves building together. The team has worked together for four years, but not only on construction – they also create lore, quests, and even magic. They estimate the project to be about 45% complete and are looking forward to the next four years. And so are we!
一座富丽堂皇，宛如出自童话书般的美丽古堡，郭外充满了烟火气息的民宅，这一切多么让人赏心悦目。由 Guss 投稿的 Realm of Lothiredon 是一个由有着25名热爱建造的成员携手共建的。该团队已经活跃了差不多4年了，不过他们可不单单致力于建筑——他们创作神话传说、游戏任务甚至是魔法技能。他们的工程已经完成了差不多45%了，并期待完成品可以在4年内和各位见面。对呀，我们也很期待！
Now it’s your turn! What have you been building lately? Tell us all about it by sending some screenshots and information to FeatureMe@minecraft.net, and you might just see your creation featured here on Minecraft.net!
现在，是你的回合！你最近有没有创造出什么美丽建筑？联系我们，并附上一些它的照片和信息，只要把它发送到 FeatureMe@minecraft.net ，然后你的作品就有机会放在Minecraft.net上展示哦！【321yu_wango 译自官网 2020 年 03 月 26 日发布的 A Kingdom of Lore and Wonder；原作者 Jess Robinson】【本文排版借助了：SPX】
注：The Realm of Lothiredon为一服务器名称。
